title: Japan Noto Peninsula Hideaway with Traditional Restaurant & Spa
description:
Tucked away in a picturesque Japanese mountain town, this property seamlessly blends modern elegance with traditional craftsmanship. Enjoy breathtaking views from the comfort of your room and unwind as you witness Japan's stunning sunsets. A sanctuary for relaxation, enjoy the region's local flavours at Locavore Restaurant, while the therapeutic waters of indoor spa await guests.

Step outside to experience centuries of Japanese history with beautiful surrounds. Mercure Noto Resort & Spa puts you moments from Noto Golf Club and within easy reach of the glistening waters of the Noto Kongo Coast, overlooking the Sea of Japan.
offer_address: Ra-1 Yaguradani, Hakui District, Shika, Ishikawa 925-0156, Japan
